mapper.insert: insert into c_question (title, description, gmt_create, gmt_modified, creator, tag) values (#{title}, #{description}, #{gmtCreate}, #{gmtModified}, #{creator}, #{tag})
mapper.select: select * from c_question where creator = #{id} limit #{offset}, #{size}
select count(1) from c_question where creator = #{id}
select id from c_question where title = #{title} and description = #{description} and creator = #{creator}
